tosdr.case: You can opt out of promotional communications

title: You can opt out of promotional communications
quoteDoc: Privacy & Cookie Policy, Terms of Service
quoteText:
Promotional Communications.</u> You can opt-out of receiving certain promotional communications (e-mails and push notifications) from us at any time by (i) for e-mails, following the instructions as provided in e-mails to click on the unsubscribe link.
and (ii) for push notifications or in-app messages, adjusting the permissions in your mobile device.
